Paris (France). Garde nationale
metadata.title: Expédition du général Lameth au couvent des Annonciades célestes, le 26 octobre.
metadata.creator: Tallien, Jean-Lambert, 1767-2822
Bonnay, Charles-François, marquis de, 1750-1825
French Revolution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.citation: Tourneux, M. Paris pendant la Révolution française, III, 16363a
metadata.description: Attributed to Charles-François de Bonnay. Cf. Tourneux
Suggested date of publication from Saricks
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:2, 6520
Variant of Saricks, A. Melvin Coll., I, 430
Tourneux, M. Paris pendant la Révolution française
Satirical work on the search for Charles-Louis-François de Paule de Barentin at the couvent des Annonciades on 26 October 1789, by Charles de Lameth and the Garde nationale de Paris
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
